name: Rosso
description: Rosso is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a unique twist. Its box body is adorned in a striking rosso corsa shade, giving it a sleek and eye-catching appearance. Equipped with soldier buttons, it exudes a sense of authority and power. Its arms and legs are designed to resemble a nimble cat, providing it with agility and dexterity in its movements. The screen of Rosso is shaped like a snake, displaying complex waveforms and data with precision and elegance.
